Protein Names: Beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase 2 (Beta-1,4-GalTase 2) (Beta4Gal-T2) (b4Gal-T2) (EC 2.4.1.-) (Beta-N-acetylglucosaminyl-glycolipid beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase) (Beta-N-acetylglucosaminylglycopeptide beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase) (EC 2.4.1.38) (Lactose synthase A protein) (EC 2.4.1.22) (N-acetyllactosamine synthase) (EC 2.4.1.90) (Nal synthase) (UDP-Gal:beta-GlcNAc beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase 2) (UDP-galactose:beta-N-acetylglucosamine beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase 2)
